ratings.comment: So unorganized, TAs did everything and grading was different between all of the TAs. They also graded unbelievably hard for what this class was.
Really good teacher who respects students very much. HW is not much, she makes lectures very intriguing and also makes you feel free at classes.
Jolanda is super nice and makes learning honestly a joy. Understanding and caring, makes me want to take her again. I also wasn't in her class and she was so nice about transferring over into it.

Jolanda is an excellent professor. She makes you engage with the class on a whole new level. She created the best classroom environment I have been in because she makes everyone comfortable speaking. It is a Lit class so you have to read but she chooses good texts so they're enjoyable.

I don't enjoy professors often, nut Prof. Taylor is one of the good ones. She is so passionate about Dutch culture, literature, and history; but what made her amazing is feeling human in her class. I felt more than a number like I usually do and I felt important. She's a wonderful professor who inspires interest even if you hate literature. 10/10

Jolanda was one of my favorite professors at UW. She is extremely passionate about the Dutch culture. There are weekly readings for this class, but they are all listed in the syllabus so you can get ahead. Come to class prepared as it is largely discussion-based and it is much more interesting if you can follow the conversation & participate!

Professor Taylor is probably the nicest professor Ive ever had. I was surprised by how much I enjoyed the books we read, you can tell she chose them with care. Overall, a really easy A and a fun course. If you have the chance, take a class with her!

Very helpful Professor that made learning fun when I was uninterested in the topic. Readings can get to be a lot, but she goes over them in lectures so if you don't read you can still get a good grade. Incredible professor- take her classes.
super friendly and approachable

Prof. Taylor is definitely a friendly and enthusiastic teacher. I took her Dutch culture class to fill space but it ended up being a really interesting experience learning about the history and culture of the Netherlands. Honestly though, the best thing is being able to say you've had a teacher as friendly and amazing as Jolanda.

Professor Taylor is awesome! The class is very interesting and she is passionate about the subjects. She is an extremely fair grader and understanding of students needs. Very nice teacher that wants everyone to do well. One of my favorite classes in my four years at UW!

olanda is a great professor! I would highly recommend taking German 245. The class was easy and did not really require reading all the material because the main points were discussed in class. The class size was small so I got to know everyone pretty well and the work load is minimal. Grading seemed to be pretty lenient as well.
Great professor! A breeze if you read the books, which are pretty good reads.  Two short papers, weekly blog posts, and two midterms.  Interesting class, easy A.

Jolanda is very personable and has a broad knowledge about the Low Countries. Class is very much discussion based, because of this our class was able to get to know one another and class was a lot of fun. Don't really have to read all the material. Graded on weekly blogs, short paper, presentation, and final take home paper. Would recommend Jolanda
Professor Taylor is an incredibly chill and easy going professor. Very helpful an easy A. Also, not hot, people are spewing lies deliberately.

Outstanding professor. You can tell that she is passionate about what she teaches. Plus, German 245 is a really easy class. Grade mainly depends on class attendance and participation, a research paper, and a take-home final. Interesting learning about America during its colonial times too!
Love love love love love! I wish we could have her next semester, also. She teaches Dutch with immersion style [mostly] which is also great.

Prof Taylor is an amazing teacher. This class was my favorite class thus far in collage and I had no interest in Dutch before this class. The books you read are usually an easy read and you'll want to read them. I would recommend this class and Prof. Taylor to anyone, even if you dont prefer reading.

My favorite teacher on campus - by far. She made class interesting, shes super nice and her readings were interesting. Easy work load, four 2-page reading responses, one mid-term, and one final take home paper. She brings a lot of culture into her class, very interesting!
my favorite professor at uw madison.  extremely intelligent, helpful, caring, lively, interesting and nice.
Great prof, very enthusiastic and helpful.  Classes aren't too hard, but are still challenging.
Jolanda is the sweetest professor I have ever had.  She is super caring and awesome!
Probably my favorite prof so far.  Really nice, and not too hard but not too easy.  Highly recommended.
